https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/86o2onbcUly59qq7RINLRHYooqz.jpg A workplace robot, AUTO, transforms into a killing machine when he discovers he will be replaced by a more efficient model. AUTO fears being terminated and will stop at nothing to prevent his own destruction. The human employees must band together to stop him before it's too late. Automation
